Entries.default: "This area's closed to anyone who ain't one of Captain Benweth's personal crew. And you ain't. So get lost, swab."
"Says who?"
"Says who, what?"
"Who says I'm not one of Benweth's crew?"
The guard snorts loudly.
"I happen to know each and every shipmate who's one of Brutal Ben's own. And you ain't 'em."
"Who says Benweth gets to make those kind of calls?"
"You new?" He narrows his eyes at you. Looks you up and down.
"Captain Aeldys does. Her fort, her rules. Benweth's her right hand on account of their history together. When she ain't here, like now, he's in charge."
"And he says this area's for his crew alone."
[Attack] "That's nice."
"Bloody end to you!"
[Back away with your hands up.] "Fine. Look, I'm going. See?"
"Oh, I see. 'Cause I got my eye on you, chum. But I'll also be showing you back so you don't any ideas."
"Alarm's been going off like sea-sirens in heat lately. And last thing I need's ole Brutal Ben breathing down my neck."
"You're a familiar-looking sort, ain't you? Or mayhaps I've caught you skulking up here a time before?"
"Best be praying to Ondra that ain't true, swabby. 'Cause if it is, I'll see you swinging -" He hefts the butt of his rifle against his shoulder, taking a ready aim.
"- by your blasted guts knotted around your throat."
"No more warnings, chum. I'm sounding the horn!"
"I'll enjoy bloodying your face!"
"I hear you're getting along real nice with my captain. Impressive. Benny doesn't respect many other than Aeldys."
